roleset.name: move out of place
roleset.note: DISPLACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'displace' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no comparison. (from displace.01-v predicate notes)
DISPLACEMENT-N NOTES: Based on Sharp and Thyme data. Comparison to displace.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from displacement.01-n)

example.name: no place mentioned
example.text: Digital-1, however, doesn't expect *trace*-1 to displace IBM mainframes that are already installed at big companies.
example.arg: IBM mainframes that are already installed at big companies

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The DPP sees this election as its chance to displace the KMT and set a precedent for the peaceful rotation of political parties in power , thereby consolidating its position as the main alternative to the KMT .

example.name: use arg 2 for posterior/anterior unless a more specific location is given
example.text: CT scan demonstrated a significant posterior displacement of the proximal articulating fracture fragment.
example.arg: of the proximal articulating fracture fragment
